page.title: 05POCKET MONEY MAKING SKEGNESS
page.content: In summer the town is full of holiday makers,and all the amusement arcades are open.Then on Saturdays I go barrowing and get eight pounds.I put all the money in the bank.To go barrowing means to take a hand cart and carry peoples luggage for them.I wait at the{National Bus Station} on{Richmond Drive.}I take the luggage to the hotels.Most of the week ends I go barrowing. I go out until one o' clock.The people tell us where to go. The barrow carries about eight cases. The Tower Arcade is a big room where they have a lot of games,amusements and they also have pool tables. Sometimes I go round the slot machines and find some money left in the machines or on the floor. {Jon Lawrence. aged 10} { { }
